long_description: The Gear Aid Tent Repair Kit can make the difference between wet or dry, insects or no insects, complaints or smiles. This gear repair kit is essential number 1! Use it to fix rips, tears, leaks, broken poles and busted zippers. Perform emergency field repairs on your pack, jacket and sleeping bag; you can even glue the sole of your boot back on. Gear repair includes one 0.5 in. tent pole splint. one 0.625 in. tent pole splint. 2 double-coil, #8 zipper sliders. one 6 x 4 in. no-see-um patch. one 10 x 3 in. clear Tenacious adhesive patch. 1/4 oz. Seam Grip adhesive. Sewing repair includes one #69 olive green bobbin. one #18 Chenille sewing needle. one #16 Yarn sewing needle. 4 safety pins. 1 seam ripper. Cleaners include 1/2 oz. Mirazyme enzyme based deodorizer and 2 alcohol towlettes.
short_description: The Gear Aid Tent Repair Kit can make the difference between wet or dry, insects or no insects, complaints or smiles. This gear repair kit is essential number 1!
